column2: What brand of cigarettes do you usually smoke?

What length were the Marlboro cigarettes you smoked most often during the past 30 days? Were they shorts, regulars (also known as king-sized), or 100s?
column9: ASK IF "What brand of cigarettes do you usually smoke?" = '28'

column2: During the past 30 days, that is, since [DATEFILL], have you smoked part or all of a roll-your-own tobacco cigarette?
